item.title: Hosting xaringan slides using github pages
item.description: This is a quick guide to hosting xaringan slides online using github pages. To start with I create an RStudio project (initialising a git repository) and then slides.Rmd using the xaringan R markdown template. At this point we could modify the R markdown file but I’m going to make sure it works online first. Having created slides.html by knitting the R markdown file, we can commit everything we’ve got. git add .
